EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_The Cloud Native Journey Q415.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: The Cloud Native Journey Webinar is tomorrow 10/6
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We are sending you a friendly reminder that you are registered for our Cloud Native Journey Webinar tomorrow, October 6, 2015. Please see event details below.
Date: October 6, 2015 Time: 10AM PST- 1:00PM EST Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1049037/DAB26D08E082BA983F973275134779BB> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save The Date:default=edit me}} We Look Forward to you Joining us! The Pivotal Team
